text: Manuel Cruz Sobreviñas (7 April 1924 – 18 July 2020) was a Filipino prelate of the Catholic Church. He was born in Dinalupihan, Philippines. He was ordained a priest on March 10, 1951. Sobreviñas was appointed auxiliary bishop of the Archdiocese of Manila on April 7, 1979. On February 25, 1993 he was appointed bishop to the Diocese of Imus until retirement on October 22, 2001.Catholic- Hierarchy Sobreviñas died on 18 July 2020 at a hospital in Manila, aged 96.Oldest Filipino bishop dies at age 96 ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Central Luzon
title: Manuel C. Sobreviñas
